document.full_text: actor charlie sheen, whose assertion that he is always "winning, duh" has become a pop catchphrase, faced a new reality the day after his stage show bombed. fans and critics said: "losing, really."
document.title: charlie sheen faces prospect of losing, duh
lines_and_colors: actor charlie sheen, whose assertion that he is always "winning, duh" has become a pop catchphrase, faced a new reality the day after his stage show bombed. fans and critics said: "losing, really."
